Room.Name: Roland's Fighting Academy - Green Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the green training room inside Roland's Fighting Academy, preparing to do battle with a large knight dressed in green chain armor.
Room.LongDescription: In order to advance to the level of Punisher, you must first prove your worth to the Academy that you are in deed ready. This proof lies in your defeating the green knight which stands before you. The green knight is waiting for your first move.
